We help you to build digital business

.01
Send Email

Listen stories of user understand points and give a estimate about cost and time-frame.

.02
Meet Online

Analyze requirements and suggest the best possible solutions tailored to user needs.

.03
Price Estimation

Create a clear action plan with milestones based on user goals and expectations.

.04
Work Together

Collaborate closely with the user to refine ideas and finalize project scope.

.05
Start Project

Deliver a transparent breakdown of tasks, resources, and timeline estimates.

What clients says about our company

Quanta team quickly understood our business requirements and were proactive and flexible with our ongoing support and developments. You can definitely trust them for complex project requirements as they are top-notch in their field and we can only recommend it.

Senior Marketing Manager at Caya

Questions and answers

Once you approve the final design, well deliver all the necessary files in your preferred formats. If part of a larger project, well move forward with the next phase seamlessly.
Absolutely. We can start from your wireframes, mockups, or even partially completed designs. Well refine and elevate them while keeping your original intent intact.
We include a set number of revisions in each project. If additional changes are needed beyond that, well provide a clear, upfront cost before proceedingno surprises.
Yes, we regularly partner with agencies. Whether white-label or collaborative, we can adapt to your workflow and act as an extension of your team.
We typically need a short brief, branding assets (if available), and any content or examples you want us to consider. The clearer the direction, the quicker the results.
The Agile Manifesto values responding to change over following a plan, but that doesnt mean planning is ignoredit encourages flexible, iterative planning that adapts as the project evolves.
A Statement of Work (SOW) outlines the project scope, deliverables, timeline, and expectations. Its a foundational document that ensures alignment between all parties from day one.
Start by mastering Agile principles and frameworks like Scrum or Kanban. Gain hands-on experience with iterative projects, then consider certifications like PMI-ACP or Certified ScrumMaster (CSM).

it?","faqs_desc":"Once you approve the final design, we\u2019ll deliver all the necessary files in your preferred formats. If part of a larger project, we\u2019ll move forward with the next phase seamlessly."},{"open_item":"","faqs_title":"Can you work with wireframes or our existing designs?","faqs_desc":"Absolutely. We can start from your wireframes, mockups, or even partially completed designs. We\u2019ll refine and elevate them while keeping your original intent intact.","_id":"233a77c"},{"open_item":"","faqs_title":"Do you charge for additional revisions?","faqs_desc":"We include a set number of revisions in each project. If additional changes are needed beyond that, we\u2019ll provide a clear, upfront cost before proceeding\u2014no surprises.","_id":"4261dbd"},{"open_item":"","faqs_title":"I have an agency. Can I outsource work to you?","faqs_desc":"Yes, we regularly partner with agencies. Whether white-label or collaborative, we can adapt to your workflow and act as an extension of your team.","_id":"6fb5601"},{"open_item":"","faqs_title":"What do I need to give you to get started?","faqs_desc":"We typically need a short brief, branding assets (if available), and any content or examples you want us to consider. The clearer the direction, the quicker the results.","_id":"704b3eb"},{"open_item":"","faqs_title":"How does the agile manifesto address planning?","faqs_desc":"The Agile Manifesto values responding to change over following a plan, but that doesn\u2019t mean planning is ignored\u2014it encourages flexible, iterative planning that adapts as the project evolves.","_id":"726d88d"},{"open_item":"","faqs_title":"What is a statement of work in project management?","faqs_desc":"A Statement of Work (SOW) outlines the project scope, deliverables, timeline, and expectations. It\u2019s a foundational document that ensures alignment between all parties from day one.","_id":"c902d79"},{"open_item":"","faqs_title":"How to become an agile project manager?","faqs_desc":"Start by mastering Agile principles and frameworks like Scrum or Kanban. Gain hands-on experience with iterative projects, then consider certifications like PMI-ACP or Certified ScrumMaster (CSM).","_id":"003f537"}],"animejs_animation_easing_custom":"cubicBezier(1, 0, 0, 1)","_margin":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":false},"_padding":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":false}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"quantofaqs"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":false}]

Start a project

Our approach is all about understanding your needs and bringing your ideas to life without complexity. We thrive turning imaginative concepts into user friendly digital solutions. Whether it's a sleek website, a user-friendly app or a memorable brand identity, we focus on creating designs that not only.

Steven Enderson

Building digital products, brands, and experience

Love the design

Love the design

Love the design

Love the design

Love the design

Love the design

Love the design

Love the design

Love the design

Love the design

Love the design

Welcome to my portfolio! I'm Steven Enderson, a passionate and innovative web designer and developer based in United States. With 09 years of experience in the industry, I specialize in creating visually stunning and highly functional websites that provide an exceptional user experience.

Whether it's crafting a visually stunning brand identity, designing immersive digital experiences, or developing strategic marketing campaigns, we approach each project with meticulous attention to detail and an unwavering dedication to quality.

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: quanto
item.content:encoded:
California-based team driving creative branding solutions

4.8

2500+ reviews based on client feedback

Scroll down

. +

Years of agency experience

. +

Successfully projects done

. +

World-wide team members

. %

Clients satisfied & retention

We believe in the power of
design to elevate businesses
and product solutions

Our approach is all about understanding your needs and bringing your ideas to life without complexity. We thrive turning imaginative concepts into user friendly digital solutions. Whether it's a sleek website, a user-friendly app or a memorable brand identity, we focus on creating designs that not only.

Designing immersive digital experiences, or developing strategic marketing campaigns, we approach each project with meticulous attention to detail.

item.title: Pricing
item.dc:creator: quanto
item.content:encoded:
Delivering quality that fits your budget

Scroll down

Find your right plan

Standard

Ideal for small businesses or startups.

$990

  • Access to all basic features
  • Work customization
  • Mobile and desktop app
  • Access to all design templates
  • Priority customer support
Go with this plan
Professional

Ideal for small businesses or startups.

$1800

  • Access to all basic features
  • Work customization
  • Mobile and desktop app
  • Access to all design templates
  • Priority customer support
Go with this plan
Enterprise

Ideal for small businesses or startups.

$2900

  • Access to all basic features
  • Work customization
  • Mobile and desktop app
  • Access to all design templates
  • Priority customer support
Go with this plan

Questions and answers

Once you approve the final design, well deliver all the necessary files in your preferred formats. If part of a larger project, well move forward with the next phase seamlessly.
Absolutely. We can start from your wireframes, mockups, or even partially completed designs. Well refine and elevate them while keeping your original intent intact.
We include a set number of revisions in each project. If additional changes are needed beyond that, well provide a clear, upfront cost before proceedingno surprises.
Yes, we regularly partner with agencies. Whether white-label or collaborative, we can adapt to your workflow and act as an extension of your team.
We typically need a short brief, branding assets (if available), and any content or examples you want us to consider. The clearer the direction, the quicker the results.
The Agile Manifesto values responding to change over following a plan, but that doesnt mean planning is ignoredit encourages flexible, iterative planning that adapts as the project evolves.
A Statement of Work (SOW) outlines the project scope, deliverables, timeline, and expectations. Its a foundational document that ensures alignment between all parties from day one.
Start by mastering Agile principles and frameworks like Scrum or Kanban. Gain hands-on experience with iterative projects, then consider certifications like PMI-ACP or Certified ScrumMaster (CSM).

Questions and answers

Once you approve the final design, well deliver all the necessary files in your preferred formats. If part of a larger project, well move forward with the next phase seamlessly.
Absolutely. We can start from your wireframes, mockups, or even partially completed designs. Well refine and elevate them while keeping your original intent intact.
We include a set number of revisions in each project. If additional changes are needed beyond that, well provide a clear, upfront cost before proceedingno surprises.
Yes, we regularly partner with agencies. Whether white-label or collaborative, we can adapt to your workflow and act as an extension of your team.
We typically need a short brief, branding assets (if available), and any content or examples you want us to consider. The clearer the direction, the quicker the results.
The Agile Manifesto values responding to change over following a plan, but that doesnt mean planning is ignoredit encourages flexible, iterative planning that adapts as the project evolves.
A Statement of Work (SOW) outlines the project scope, deliverables, timeline, and expectations. Its a foundational document that ensures alignment between all parties from day one.
Start by mastering Agile principles and frameworks like Scrum or Kanban. Gain hands-on experience with iterative projects, then consider certifications like PMI-ACP or Certified ScrumMaster (CSM).

item.title: Team
item.dc:creator: quanto
item.content:encoded:
Building success through collaboration

Scroll down

Meet our innovative team members

Join the team
Tony Lixivel
Lead Full Stack Developer
Daniel Schrier
Senior Product Designer
Audrey Tassel
Administrative & HR Assistant
Tanguy Caruel
Front End Developer
Brian Herbert
Senior Software Developer
Anna Peterson
Lead Marketing Manager
Patrick Johnson
Lead Marketing Manager
Cynthia Taylor
Human Resources Officer

What clients says about our company

Quanta team quickly understood our business requirements and were proactive and flexible with our ongoing support and developments. You can definitely trust them for complex project requirements as they are top-notch in their field and we can only recommend it.

Jenny Bennett
Senior Marketing Manager at Caya

Quanta team quickly understood our business requirements and were proactive and flexible with our ongoing support and developments. You can definitely trust them for complex project requirements as they are top-notch in their field and we can only recommend it.

Nathan Hallmark
Designer Team Head at Qxygen

Quanta team quickly understood our business requirements and were proactive and flexible with our ongoing support and developments. You can definitely trust them for complex project requirements as they are top-notch in their field and we can only recommend it.

Danny Aronson
Senior Brand Design at Goodnotes

item.title: How young leaders can take charge of their professional growth
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
In the realm of digital innovation, the demand for creative and immersive experiences extends far beyond the confines of the screen. At Rethink, we are excited to unveil our latest project, the "Beyond the Screen Digital Products Marketplace," a platform where the boundaries of digital design are transcended. In this blog post, we delve into the intricate process of crafting the design for this groundbreaking marketplace that takes users on a journey beyond conventional digital experiences.

The vision behind the "Beyond the Screen" marketplace was clear from the start to redefine the way users interact with digital products. We envisioned a space where users could not only browse and purchase digital goods but also immerse themselves in an interactive and visually captivating environment.

Quanto team quickly understood our business requirements and were proactive and flexible with our ongoing support and developments. You can definitely trust them for complex project.

- Ashton Porter

The cornerstone of our design philosophy for the marketplace was a deep understanding of user needs behaviors. We conducted extensive user research to identify pain points in existing digital marketplaces and sought to address these through thoughtful design solutions. User personas were crafted to guide the design

In this blog post, we delve into the intricate process of crafting the design for this groundbreaking marketplace that takes users on a journey beyond conventional digital experiences.

item.title: Kinetic Sandscapes
item.dc:creator: alhasan
item.content:encoded:
Hopscotch Payments

Scroll down

Project
overview

Tasked with revamping the branding and corporate website for Bit Weaver Studio, a forward-thinking creative agency, our team delved deep into their ethos, distilling their essence into a kaleidoscope of colors, shapes, and narratives. Seamlessly blending innovative design with user-centric functionality, we transformed their online presence into an immersive journey, reflecting their diverse talents and imaginative approach. From the fluidity of the logo to the intricacies of the interface, every element was meticulously crafted, resulting in a captivating showcase of Reimagining Reality creativity and our studio's design finesse.

This package is ideal for businesses aiming to launch new products, enhance existing ones, or establish competitive edge in their industry. By combining thoughtful design, strategic innovation, and a user-first approach, we create products.

Visit live website Category
Branding
Service
Brand Strategy
Date
March 6, 2024
Client
MirrorTheme
Software
Webflow, Figma

item.title: Hopscotch Payments
item.dc:creator: kawsar
item.content:encoded:
Hopscotch Payments

Scroll down

Project
overview

Tasked with revamping the branding and corporate website for Bit Weaver Studio, a forward-thinking creative agency, our team delved deep into their ethos, distilling their essence into a kaleidoscope of colors, shapes, and narratives. Seamlessly blending innovative design with user-centric functionality, we transformed their online presence into an immersive journey, reflecting their diverse talents and imaginative approach. From the fluidity of the logo to the intricacies of the interface, every element was meticulously crafted, resulting in a captivating showcase of Reimagining Reality creativity and our studio's design finesse.

This package is ideal for businesses aiming to launch new products, enhance existing ones, or establish competitive edge in their industry. By combining thoughtful design, strategic innovation, and a user-first approach, we create products.

Visit live website Category
Branding
Service
Brand Strategy
Date
March 6, 2024
Client
MirrorTheme
Software
Webflow, Figma

item.title: Stories Worthwhile
item.dc:creator: kawsar
item.content:encoded:
Hopscotch Payments

Scroll down

Project
overview

Tasked with revamping the branding and corporate website for Bit Weaver Studio, a forward-thinking creative agency, our team delved deep into their ethos, distilling their essence into a kaleidoscope of colors, shapes, and narratives. Seamlessly blending innovative design with user-centric functionality, we transformed their online presence into an immersive journey, reflecting their diverse talents and imaginative approach. From the fluidity of the logo to the intricacies of the interface, every element was meticulously crafted, resulting in a captivating showcase of Reimagining Reality creativity and our studio's design finesse.

This package is ideal for businesses aiming to launch new products, enhance existing ones, or establish competitive edge in their industry. By combining thoughtful design, strategic innovation, and a user-first approach, we create products.

Visit live website Category
Branding
Service
Brand Strategy
Date
March 6, 2024
Client
MirrorTheme
Software
Webflow, Figma

item.title: Brooklyn Brewery
item.dc:creator: kawsar
item.content:encoded:
Hopscotch Payments

Scroll down

Project
overview

Tasked with revamping the branding and corporate website for Bit Weaver Studio, a forward-thinking creative agency, our team delved deep into their ethos, distilling their essence into a kaleidoscope of colors, shapes, and narratives. Seamlessly blending innovative design with user-centric functionality, we transformed their online presence into an immersive journey, reflecting their diverse talents and imaginative approach. From the fluidity of the logo to the intricacies of the interface, every element was meticulously crafted, resulting in a captivating showcase of Reimagining Reality creativity and our studio's design finesse.

This package is ideal for businesses aiming to launch new products, enhance existing ones, or establish competitive edge in their industry. By combining thoughtful design, strategic innovation, and a user-first approach, we create products.

Visit live website Category
Branding
Service
Brand Strategy
Date
March 6, 2024
Client
MirrorTheme
Software
Webflow, Figma

item.title: Senior Product Designer
item.dc:creator: alhasan
item.content:encoded:
Default Kit

Were seeking a Junior to Mid-level Designer to join our dynamic team. In this role, youll assist in delivering graphic and digital design projects, collaborating closely with our creatives, project managers, Creative Director, and development team. Your mission will be to merge user needs with business objectives, crafting seamless and impactful design experiences.

To succeed in this role, you should showcase a solid understanding of design principles, a willingness to learn and adapt to feedback, and a keen eye for aesthetic excellence.

What you will do
  • Support Growth team in expanding customer base within legal industry as well as new markets
  • Find prospective customer leads via LinkedIn Sales Navigator, industry directories, personal network and other sources
  • Qualify prospective customer leads via email, phone, and Linkedin messaging
  • Track and analyze prospective customer pipeline, presenting stats and progress to Growth team
  • Identify trends in prospective customer engagement with various outreach campaigns
  • Help strategize, implement, and maintain an efficient sales system, primarily within Hubspot Sales and Hubspot Marketing
  • Create and maintain sales and marketing materials, like pricing sheets and feature highlights
  • Support special projects, like event sponsorships and industry partnerships
  • Contribute to customer support initiatives
Skills that you should have
  • Solid and strong PHP knowledge.
  • Really good understanding in OOP, Namespace, Traits & Design Patterns
  • Intermediate to Advanced JavaScript knowledge.
  • Fluent English speaking and writing is preferred but not required.
  • Writing reusable, testable, secured and efficient PHP, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, MySQL and AJAX Code.
  • Excellent knowledge about WP custom post type, custom taxonomy, and custom meta box
  • Fluent in WordPress, PHP, plugins, themes security, JavaScript, and other technologies
  • Clear concepts of WordPress Actions, Hooks, custom queries, meta fields.
  • Proficient with relational (SQL) and non-relational database platforms
  • Optimize performance of applications utilizing industry standards on all ends of the architecture.
  • Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes.
  • Coordinating the workflow between the UI/UX Designer, the QA, and yourself.
  • Problem-solving capabilities
  • Age 20 to 35 years
Educational qualification
  • It doesnt matter where you went to college or what your CGPA was as long as you are smart, passionate, ready to work hard and have fun.
Perks and benefits that you will get
  • Competitive compensation and equity package
  • 99% company paid medical, dental, and vision coverage for employees and dependents (for US employees)
  • Flexible Spending Account (FSA) and Dependent Care Flexible Spending Account (DCFSA)
  • Healthcare reimbursement (for International employees)
  • Life, AD&D, Short and Long Term Disability Insurance
  • 401(k) with 4% company matching
  • Professional development reimbursement
  • Wellness stipends
  • Unlimited PTO
  • Paid parental leave
  • Remote work opportunities
  • Home office & technology reimbursement
Location
California , United State
Job Type
Full time (Remote)
Experience
Senior Level
Vacancies
02
Salary
$24k - 65k / Year
Office time
8:00 AM to 4:00 PM
Working Days
Weekly 5 days (Sun - Thu)
Experience
Senior Level
Deadline
20 February, 2025
Apply for this position

item.title: Communication Executive
item.dc:creator: kawsar
item.content:encoded:
Default Kit

Were seeking a Junior to Mid-level Designer to join our dynamic team. In this role, youll assist in delivering graphic and digital design projects, collaborating closely with our creatives, project managers, Creative Director, and development team. Your mission will be to merge user needs with business objectives, crafting seamless and impactful design experiences.

To succeed in this role, you should showcase a solid understanding of design principles, a willingness to learn and adapt to feedback, and a keen eye for aesthetic excellence.

What you will do
  • Support Growth team in expanding customer base within legal industry as well as new markets
  • Find prospective customer leads via LinkedIn Sales Navigator, industry directories, personal network and other sources
  • Qualify prospective customer leads via email, phone, and Linkedin messaging
  • Track and analyze prospective customer pipeline, presenting stats and progress to Growth team
  • Identify trends in prospective customer engagement with various outreach campaigns
  • Help strategize, implement, and maintain an efficient sales system, primarily within Hubspot Sales and Hubspot Marketing
  • Create and maintain sales and marketing materials, like pricing sheets and feature highlights
  • Support special projects, like event sponsorships and industry partnerships
  • Contribute to customer support initiatives
Skills that you should have
  • Solid and strong PHP knowledge.
  • Really good understanding in OOP, Namespace, Traits & Design Patterns
  • Intermediate to Advanced JavaScript knowledge.
  • Fluent English speaking and writing is preferred but not required.
  • Writing reusable, testable, secured and efficient PHP, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, MySQL and AJAX Code.
  • Excellent knowledge about WP custom post type, custom taxonomy, and custom meta box
  • Fluent in WordPress, PHP, plugins, themes security, JavaScript, and other technologies
  • Clear concepts of WordPress Actions, Hooks, custom queries, meta fields.
  • Proficient with relational (SQL) and non-relational database platforms
  • Optimize performance of applications utilizing industry standards on all ends of the architecture.
  • Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes.
  • Coordinating the workflow between the UI/UX Designer, the QA, and yourself.
  • Problem-solving capabilities
  • Age 20 to 35 years
Educational qualification
  • It doesnt matter where you went to college or what your CGPA was as long as you are smart, passionate, ready to work hard and have fun.
Perks and benefits that you will get
  • Competitive compensation and equity package
  • 99% company paid medical, dental, and vision coverage for employees and dependents (for US employees)
  • Flexible Spending Account (FSA) and Dependent Care Flexible Spending Account (DCFSA)
  • Healthcare reimbursement (for International employees)
  • Life, AD&D, Short and Long Term Disability Insurance
  • 401(k) with 4% company matching
  • Professional development reimbursement
  • Wellness stipends
  • Unlimited PTO
  • Paid parental leave
  • Remote work opportunities
  • Home office & technology reimbursement
Location
California , United State
Job Type
Full time (Remote)
Experience
Senior Level
Vacancies
02
Salary
$24k - 65k / Year
Office time
8:00 AM to 4:00 PM
Working Days
Weekly 5 days (Sun - Thu)
Experience
Senior Level
Deadline
20 February, 2025

item.title: Front End Developer
item.dc:creator: kawsar
item.content:encoded:
Default Kit

Were seeking a Junior to Mid-level Designer to join our dynamic team. In this role, youll assist in delivering graphic and digital design projects, collaborating closely with our creatives, project managers, Creative Director, and development team. Your mission will be to merge user needs with business objectives, crafting seamless and impactful design experiences.

To succeed in this role, you should showcase a solid understanding of design principles, a willingness to learn and adapt to feedback, and a keen eye for aesthetic excellence.

What you will do
  • Support Growth team in expanding customer base within legal industry as well as new markets
  • Find prospective customer leads via LinkedIn Sales Navigator, industry directories, personal network and other sources
  • Qualify prospective customer leads via email, phone, and Linkedin messaging
  • Track and analyze prospective customer pipeline, presenting stats and progress to Growth team
  • Identify trends in prospective customer engagement with various outreach campaigns
  • Help strategize, implement, and maintain an efficient sales system, primarily within Hubspot Sales and Hubspot Marketing
  • Create and maintain sales and marketing materials, like pricing sheets and feature highlights
  • Support special projects, like event sponsorships and industry partnerships
  • Contribute to customer support initiatives
Skills that you should have
  • Solid and strong PHP knowledge.
  • Really good understanding in OOP, Namespace, Traits & Design Patterns
  • Intermediate to Advanced JavaScript knowledge.
  • Fluent English speaking and writing is preferred but not required.
  • Writing reusable, testable, secured and efficient PHP, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, MySQL and AJAX Code.
  • Excellent knowledge about WP custom post type, custom taxonomy, and custom meta box
  • Fluent in WordPress, PHP, plugins, themes security, JavaScript, and other technologies
  • Clear concepts of WordPress Actions, Hooks, custom queries, meta fields.
  • Proficient with relational (SQL) and non-relational database platforms
  • Optimize performance of applications utilizing industry standards on all ends of the architecture.
  • Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes.
  • Coordinating the workflow between the UI/UX Designer, the QA, and yourself.
  • Problem-solving capabilities
  • Age 20 to 35 years
Educational qualification
  • It doesnt matter where you went to college or what your CGPA was as long as you are smart, passionate, ready to work hard and have fun.
Perks and benefits that you will get
  • Competitive compensation and equity package
  • 99% company paid medical, dental, and vision coverage for employees and dependents (for US employees)
  • Flexible Spending Account (FSA) and Dependent Care Flexible Spending Account (DCFSA)
  • Healthcare reimbursement (for International employees)
  • Life, AD&D, Short and Long Term Disability Insurance
  • 401(k) with 4% company matching
  • Professional development reimbursement
  • Wellness stipends
  • Unlimited PTO
  • Paid parental leave
  • Remote work opportunities
  • Home office & technology reimbursement
Location
California , United State
Job Type
Full time (Remote)
Experience
Senior Level
Vacancies
02
Salary
$24k - 65k / Year
Office time
8:00 AM to 4:00 PM
Working Days
Weekly 5 days (Sun - Thu)
Experience
Senior Level
Deadline
20 February, 2025

item.title: Content Marketing Executive
item.dc:creator: kawsar
item.content:encoded:
Default Kit

Were seeking a Junior to Mid-level Designer to join our dynamic team. In this role, youll assist in delivering graphic and digital design projects, collaborating closely with our creatives, project managers, Creative Director, and development team. Your mission will be to merge user needs with business objectives, crafting seamless and impactful design experiences.

To succeed in this role, you should showcase a solid understanding of design principles, a willingness to learn and adapt to feedback, and a keen eye for aesthetic excellence.

What you will do
  • Support Growth team in expanding customer base within legal industry as well as new markets
  • Find prospective customer leads via LinkedIn Sales Navigator, industry directories, personal network and other sources
  • Qualify prospective customer leads via email, phone, and Linkedin messaging
  • Track and analyze prospective customer pipeline, presenting stats and progress to Growth team
  • Identify trends in prospective customer engagement with various outreach campaigns
  • Help strategize, implement, and maintain an efficient sales system, primarily within Hubspot Sales and Hubspot Marketing
  • Create and maintain sales and marketing materials, like pricing sheets and feature highlights
  • Support special projects, like event sponsorships and industry partnerships
  • Contribute to customer support initiatives
Skills that you should have
  • Solid and strong PHP knowledge.
  • Really good understanding in OOP, Namespace, Traits & Design Patterns
  • Intermediate to Advanced JavaScript knowledge.
  • Fluent English speaking and writing is preferred but not required.
  • Writing reusable, testable, secured and efficient PHP, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, MySQL and AJAX Code.
  • Excellent knowledge about WP custom post type, custom taxonomy, and custom meta box
  • Fluent in WordPress, PHP, plugins, themes security, JavaScript, and other technologies
  • Clear concepts of WordPress Actions, Hooks, custom queries, meta fields.
  • Proficient with relational (SQL) and non-relational database platforms
  • Optimize performance of applications utilizing industry standards on all ends of the architecture.
  • Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes.
  • Coordinating the workflow between the UI/UX Designer, the QA, and yourself.
  • Problem-solving capabilities
  • Age 20 to 35 years
Educational qualification
  • It doesnt matter where you went to college or what your CGPA was as long as you are smart, passionate, ready to work hard and have fun.
Perks and benefits that you will get
  • Competitive compensation and equity package
  • 99% company paid medical, dental, and vision coverage for employees and dependents (for US employees)
  • Flexible Spending Account (FSA) and Dependent Care Flexible Spending Account (DCFSA)
  • Healthcare reimbursement (for International employees)
  • Life, AD&D, Short and Long Term Disability Insurance
  • 401(k) with 4% company matching
  • Professional development reimbursement
  • Wellness stipends
  • Unlimited PTO
  • Paid parental leave
  • Remote work opportunities
  • Home office & technology reimbursement
Location
California , United State
Job Type
Full time (Remote)
Experience
Senior Level
Vacancies
02
Salary
$24k - 65k / Year
Office time
8:00 AM to 4:00 PM
Working Days
Weekly 5 days (Sun - Thu)
Experience
Senior Level
Deadline
20 February, 2025
Apply for this position

item.title: Brand Strategy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Market Analysis & Planning

Scroll down

This service package is designed to create seamless, engaging, and innovative digital experiences. It combines intuitive User Interface (UI) design with strategic User Experience (UX) principles, ensuring your product not only looks great but also functions flawlessly. The focus extends beyond aesthetics, integrating product innovation strategies to help businesses stay competitive in an ever-evolving market. By leveraging user research, data analytics, and cutting-edge technologies, we deliver products.

This package is ideal for businesses aiming to launch new products, enhance existing ones, or establish competitive edge in their industry. By combining thoughtful design, strategic innovation, and a user-first approach, we create products that are not only relevant today but are also adaptable to the challenges of tomorrow.

Benefits of this service

The UI/UX & Product Innovation Service Package offers a multitude of tangible and strategic benefits that help businesses enhance user satisfaction, achieve measurable outcomes, and stay ahead of the competition. Here's a detailed breakdown:

  • Custom Website Design
  • Responsive Web Development
  • E-Commerce Solutions
  • JavaScript
  • API Integration
  • Front End Development
  • Front End Development
  • Content Management Systems (CMS)
  • Website Maintenance and Support
  • SEO Optimization
  • Performance Optimization

Why choose this service?

This package is ideal for businesses aiming to launch new products, enhance existing ones, or establish competitive edge in their industry. By combining thoughtful design, strategic innovation, and a user-first approach, we create products that are not only relevant today but are also adaptable to the challenges.

item.title: Regenerative Farming
item.dc:creator: kawsar
item.content:encoded:
Hopscotch Payments

Scroll down

Project
overview

Tasked with revamping the branding and corporate website for Bit Weaver Studio, a forward-thinking creative agency, our team delved deep into their ethos, distilling their essence into a kaleidoscope of colors, shapes, and narratives. Seamlessly blending innovative design with user-centric functionality, we transformed their online presence into an immersive journey, reflecting their diverse talents and imaginative approach. From the fluidity of the logo to the intricacies of the interface, every element was meticulously crafted, resulting in a captivating showcase of Reimagining Reality creativity and our studio's design finesse.

This package is ideal for businesses aiming to launch new products, enhance existing ones, or establish competitive edge in their industry. By combining thoughtful design, strategic innovation, and a user-first approach, we create products.

Visit live website Category
Branding
Service
Brand Strategy
Date
March 6, 2024
Client
MirrorTheme
Software
Webflow, Figma

item.title: Fintech Accelerator
item.dc:creator: kawsar
item.content:encoded:
Hopscotch Payments

Scroll down

Project
overview

Tasked with revamping the branding and corporate website for Bit Weaver Studio, a forward-thinking creative agency, our team delved deep into their ethos, distilling their essence into a kaleidoscope of colors, shapes, and narratives. Seamlessly blending innovative design with user-centric functionality, we transformed their online presence into an immersive journey, reflecting their diverse talents and imaginative approach. From the fluidity of the logo to the intricacies of the interface, every element was meticulously crafted, resulting in a captivating showcase of Reimagining Reality creativity and our studio's design finesse.

This package is ideal for businesses aiming to launch new products, enhance existing ones, or establish competitive edge in their industry. By combining thoughtful design, strategic innovation, and a user-first approach, we create products.

Visit live website Category
Branding
Service
Brand Strategy
Date
March 6, 2024
Client
MirrorTheme
Software
Webflow, Figma

item.title: Branding Design
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Market Analysis & Planning

Scroll down

This service package is designed to create seamless, engaging, and innovative digital experiences. It combines intuitive User Interface (UI) design with strategic User Experience (UX) principles, ensuring your product not only looks great but also functions flawlessly. The focus extends beyond aesthetics, integrating product innovation strategies to help businesses stay competitive in an ever-evolving market. By leveraging user research, data analytics, and cutting-edge technologies, we deliver products.

This package is ideal for businesses aiming to launch new products, enhance existing ones, or establish competitive edge in their industry. By combining thoughtful design, strategic innovation, and a user-first approach, we create products that are not only relevant today but are also adaptable to the challenges of tomorrow.

Benefits of this service

The UI/UX & Product Innovation Service Package offers a multitude of tangible and strategic benefits that help businesses enhance user satisfaction, achieve measurable outcomes, and stay ahead of the competition. Here's a detailed breakdown:

  • Custom Website Design
  • Responsive Web Development
  • E-Commerce Solutions
  • JavaScript
  • API Integration
  • Front End Development
  • Front End Development
  • Content Management Systems (CMS)
  • Website Maintenance and Support
  • SEO Optimization
  • Performance Optimization

Why choose this service?

This package is ideal for businesses aiming to launch new products, enhance existing ones, or establish competitive edge in their industry. The UI/UX & Product Innovation Service Package offers a multitude of tangible and strategic benefits that help businesses enhance user satisfaction, achieve measurable outcomes, and stay ahead of the competition. Here's a detailed breakdown:

  • Custom Website Design
  • Responsive Web Development
  • E-Commerce Solutions
  • JavaScript
  • API Integration
  • Front End Development
  • Front End Development
  • Content Management Systems (CMS)
  • Website Maintenance and Support
  • SEO Optimization
  • Performance Optimization

Why choose this service?

The UI/UX & Product Innovation Service Package offers a multitude of tangible and strategic benefits that help businesses enhance user satisfaction, achieve measurable outcomes, and stay ahead of the competition. Here's a detailed breakdown:

This package is ideal for businesses aiming to launch new products, enhance existing ones, or establish competitive edge in their industry. By combining thoughtful design, strategic innovation, and a user-first approach, we create products that are not only relevant today but are also adaptable to the challenges.

item.title: Contact Form
item.dc:creator: alhasan
item.content:encoded:
[text* your-name class:form-control placeholder "Your name"]
[text company class:form-control placeholder "Company name"]
[email* your-email class:form-control placeholder "Enter your e-mail address"]
[text subject class:form-control placeholder "What is the subject of your query?"]
[textarea message class:form-control rows:6 placeholder "Describe about your project"]
1 [_site_title] "[your-subject]" [_site_title] [_site_admin_email] From: [your-name] [your-email] Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This is a notification that a contact form was submitted on your website ([_site_title] [_site_url]). Reply-To: [your-email] [_site_title] "[your-subject]" [_site_title] [your-email] Message Body: [your-message] -- This email is a receipt for your contact form submission on our website ([_site_title] [_site_url]) in which your email address was used. If that was not you, please ignore this message. Reply-To: [_site_admin_email] Thank you for your message. It has been sent. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. One or more fields have an error. Please check and try again. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. Please fill out this field. This field has a too long input. This field has a too short input. There was an unknown error uploading the file. You are not allowed to upload files of this type. The uploaded file is too large. There was an error uploading the file. Please enter a date in YYYY-MM-DD format. This field has a too early date. This field has a too late date. Please enter a number. This field has a too small number. This field has a too large number. The answer to the quiz is incorrect. Please enter an email address. Please enter a URL. Please enter a telephone number.

[textarea message class:form-control rows:6 placeholder "Describe about your project"]
